title: Zizek and Jordan Peterson despise Liberalism's Progressive Offspring/Eschatology
description:
Why was there no fight in the Peterson/Zizek debate? Because they both despise progressivism. But progressivism isn't progressivism an outgrowth of liberalism? Progressivism has a clear eschatology but does liberalism have an eschatology? We look at two post-debate commentary videos and follow John Vervaeke's analysis of the having/being distinction and his agent/arena ideas in application of liberalism's eschatology of human happiness.
